level2: ^Excuse me? This gentleman is none other than my brother-in-law, Right Ctrl.
^He used to be a real gentleman, yet nobody paid any attention to him.
^Once, he was the very embodiment of chivalry, but alas, he was ignored by all.
^Envy and ambition tainted his once-pure spirit.
^Oh. I didn't think you two had such a strained relationship.
^Take me to his chambers, I implore you. I shall endeavor to reason with him.
